item.description:
I want to brave watching The Happening on Saturday night
In Milford.
(Going to Milford is really easier traffic wise for me than
Anything off on I 91, esp. during the summer time.)

The movie starts at 7:20 pm, not counting commercials,
So I will like to meet in front of the doors by the escalators
Around 7:00.
I might be down stairs at the food court having an Oriental Dinner before
Meeting members.

If you have seen The Village, Unbreakable, The Sixth Sense and the like, then
You have to be wondering what kind of strange plot twist will be at the end of this movie?

http://www.imdb.com/n...

www.imdb.com/name/nm0796117/

So come on to Milford, buy some popcorn and soda, then
Be prepared to be shocked once again.

If any of you are going to go see it else where, then please let us
Know so that we can make it into a Meet Up for you.

A.
http://www.imdb.com/t...

www.imdb.com/title/tt0949731/

B.
http://en.wikipedia.o...)

en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Happening_(2008_film)

C.
http://www.wafflemovi...

www.wafflemovies.com/happening.html


The reviews have not been the best, but then most movie reviewers would not know a good
Movie even if it bit them.

I am looking forward to seeing the actress from Hitchhikers Guide to the Galaxy and
Sci-Fic Channels Tin Man.

D
http://zooey-deschane...

zooey-deschanel.us/

E.
http://www.imdb.com/n...

www.imdb.com/name/nm0221046/

F.
http://en.wikipedia.o...

en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Zooey_Deschanel

item.name: How Can An UZ Member Not Question The Happening?
